amendment.description: Amendment allocates $250,000 to the Food and Drug Administration to develop a label for chocolate products that indicates that no child slave labor was used in the growing and harvesting of cocoa.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to provide that $250,000 is available for the purpose of carrying out the responsibilities of the Food and Drug Administration with respect to food labeling.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Engel amendment (A010) Agreed to by recorded vote: 291 - 115 (Roll no. 210).
